info.name: Contact360 API - Complete Collection
info.description:
Comprehensive API collection for Contact360 backend with 162 endpoints across 4 API versions (v1-v4). Includes authentication, filtering, exports, AI features, and data pipeline operations.

**Base URL**: {{base_url}}
**Authentication**: 
- v1 endpoints: Bearer token (JWT) for auth/users/billing/usage endpoints
- v2/v3/v4 endpoints: Bearer token (JWT)
- Public endpoints (login, register, refresh): No authentication required

## API Structure
- **V1**: Auth, Users, Billing, Usage, Health, Root
- **V2**: AI Chats, Gemini
- **V3**: Companies, Contacts, Email, Exports, LinkedIn, Activities, S3, Sales Navigator
- **V4**: Marketing, Dashboard Pages (and admin endpoints)

## Features
- Complete CRUD operations for contacts and companies
- Advanced filtering and search
- Email finder and verification
- AI chat with Gemini
- LinkedIn profile lookup
- Data pipeline operations
- Export functionality
